37#ifndef IEEE754IO_H
38#define IEEE754IO_H
39
40#define IEEE_SINGLE 1
41#define IEEE_DOUBLE 2
42
43#define IEEE_MSB 1
44#define IEEE_LSB 2
45
46#define IEEE_OK 0 /* conversion ok */
47#define IEEE_BADCALL 1 /* bad call parameters */
48#define IEEE_NAN 2 /* found an NaN */
49#define IEEE_POSINFINITY 3 /* positive infinity */
50#define IEEE_NEGINFINITY 4 /* negative infinity */
51#define IEEE_POSOVERFLOW 5 /* positive overflow */
52#define IEEE_NEGOVERFLOW 6 /* negative overflow */
53
54#define IEEE_OFFSETS 8 /* number of byte positions */
55typedef unsigned char offsets_t[IEEE_OFFSETS];
56
57int fetch_ieee754 (unsigned char **bufp, int size, l_fp *lfpp, offsets_t offsets);
58int put_ieee754 (unsigned char **bufpp, int size, l_fp *lfpp, offsets_t offsets);
59
60#endif
